summary: Just a small mod adding Talos into Dragonsreach to test your god items. He will probably kill you.
descriptionHtml:
Basically all this mod does is add Talos into Dragonsreach, as a vicious murderous monster. He exists as the one creature to rival the God Items you've likely modded into the game. 

This mod functions very well with the Non-essential children mod, and the .ini tweak to remove essential characters.

To remove essential characters open the INI editor in the mod organizer and copy and paste the following text:

[GamePlay]
bEssentialTakeNoDamage=0

HOW TO INSTALL

For this mod to function correctly place the file named "better Talos.esp" and place it in your skyrim data folder. 

If you're using the mod organizer open plugins on the right, and select "Better Talos.esp"

If you're not using the mod organizer then on the Skyrim launcher select data files, and activate "Better Talos.esp".



Please report any issues you find.
author: Bramblewish
